chapters.title: Chapter 25: Attending ElaidaChapter 26: As If the World Were Fog
chapters.info: Edorion Selorna, p. 553—Young Tairen lord. He is plump and pink, and has become harder and tanner since he left Tear. He used to play cards with Mat in the Stone of Tear, and always reacted to his cards the same way—as if he had received all low cards and none matched.
